results.definition: (usually followed by `with') well informed about or knowing thoroughly
examples: he was familiar with those roads

results.definition: having mutual interests or affections; of established friendship
a spirit (usually in animal form) that acts as an assistant to a witch or wizard
a friend who is frequently in the company of another
a person attached to the household of a high official (as a pope or bishop) who renders service in return for support
within normal everyday experience; common and ordinary; not strange
examples: familiar ordinary objects found in every home
a day like any other filled with familiar duties and experiences
